metadata.title: USN-3518-1 -- AWStats vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that AWStats incorrectly filtered certain parameters. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3518-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  awstats - 7.2+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
